GSD.description:
xtensa: Fix refcount leak bug in time.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit af0ff2da01521144bc11194f4c26485d7c9cee73. For more details please see the references link.
